protocol.name: P-GSE44781-2
protocol.text: Plants were clipped at bolting to simulate mammalian herbivore damage

protocol.name: P-GSE44781-3
protocol.text: 3 day cold treated seeds were planted in 3 inch circular pots containing sunshine plant mix. Plant were grown in greenhouse with 16:8 light and dark cycles.

protocol.name: P-GSE44781-4
protocol.text: Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE44781-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 2 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE44781-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 2 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Drosophila Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.

protocol.name: P-GSE44781-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using GeneArray Scanner G2500A.

protocol.name: P-GSE44781-8
protocol.text: The data was analysed using R software
